title: JAAL 1.1 matrix
description: A one- or two-dimensional array with fixed number of rows and columns.

id.description: A unique identifier for the matrix among all data structures.

rows.description: Number of rows in the matrix.

columns.description: Number of columns in the matrix.

key.description: The contents of the array. This index is the row.

items.description: The contents of the array. This index is the column.

rowLabels.description: Label for each row to be displayed on the bottom of the matrix.

columnLabels.description: Label for each column to be displayed on the bottom of the matrix.

legend.description: A text to be displayed on the top of the matrix.
